item.description: Contact Our Team The Backgrounds Online team is friendly, industry-educated and here to help. Contact us for a quick response. Hours: Mon – Fri, 5:00am – 5:00pm (PT) Telephone: 1-800-838-4804 Fax: 1-800-838-4654 Email: support@backgroundsonline.com Chat: =0 ? Dispute The Results Of Your Background Check If you feel the information on your background check was inaccurate, please contact us. The Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA) entitles you to dispute your results. Our team of Background Screening Specialists will review the information you wish to dispute and go directly to the source to find current, accurate information. We will also inform the company that requested a background check on you that you filed a dispute and provide them with updated background screening results if revisions are made.

FAQ's Getting Started How much does your service cost? Do you charge monthly fees? How quickly can I get started? Can I create a screening account online? What information will I need to sign up online? I am a Notary. Should I start my own screening account? My Account What information do I need from an applicant to run a background check? Can my applicant submit their own information for a background check?

Background Checks for the Financial Industry Reduce Your Hiring Risks Hiring someone who is not qualified for a financial position can lead to unexpected expenses and additional hiring cycles. Poor hiring decisions could also damage your reputation. It is imperative to select trustworthy, capable candidates to represent your business. To help, we offer Custom Background Checks that can be tailored to suit any position. You can save them for future use to reduce your hiring risks.

Background Checks for the Insurance Industry Insurance Companies Face Hiring Issues The insurance industry is constantly in need of people. It can be difficult to find personnel for all your staffing needs. That makes it even more important to employ eligible, reliable candidates. If you skip the background screening process, you may hire someone who is not qualified to represent your company and end up terminating their employment.

Privacy Policy BackgroundsOnline.com's Privacy Policy Last updated: June 13, 2017 Backgrounds Online is a consumer reporting agency governed by the Fair Credit Reporting Act ("FCRA") as well as other state and federal laws. It is required by the FCRA, 15 U.S.C. § 1681 et seq. to maintain the confidentiality of all consumer information. We respect and are committed to protecting your privacy. Our privacy policy is intended to describe how we use and handle personal information as it pertains to your usage of our web site located at http://www.

Products & Services Choose a screening package for the position you're filling or customize your own. We'll help you put together a background check that empowers you to identify the right candidate for any job. Screening Packages Custom Background Checks Basic Package $29.95 A simple, cost-effective screening solution, we consider this option a good introductory background check. Social Security Number Trace County Criminal Court Search* National Criminal Database Search Sex Offender Registry Search Terrorist Watch List Search Buy Basic Package Standard Package $49.

-- Resources Backgrounds Online provides many free resources for you. Learn about our technology and get useful, relevant information from our blogs, newsletters and other assets. State Laws New state laws are passed every year. We provide details about new and upcoming laws that could impact the hiring process where you operate so you can plan ahead to stay compliant. More Info Blog Check our weekly blog for news, tips and updates that are relevant to your business and industry.

Our Technology We don't keep up with the technology curve. We help create it. API & Integration Documents Connecting and communicating with our system is simple. We provide services for both submitting screening requests and retrieving results through XML. Results may be easily parsed and formatted to suit your needs. Request our full API documentation to get started and see just how easy it is to implement our services directly into your system.

Why Backgrounds Online? We’re more than an employment screening company. We are partners who will educate, protect and keep you compliant. Superior Customer Service Most of our customers never leave. Those that do, usually return. That’s because we provide truly dedicated service – the kind we like to receive. Our staff focuses on customer service and makes you our top priority. Experience the Backgrounds Online difference for yourself.
